statements: UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'Clicked', location = 'Homepage' WHERE device_id = 'e04e933e-5bf0-4df3-a4fb-2b6f42e7e7a3';
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET location = 'Product Page', behavior_type = 'Viewed' WHERE device_id = 'c3c6a02e-6e9b-4bcf-a2d5-92e0d9ca3d22';
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'Click' WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET location = 'New York', timestamp = '2023-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE device_id = '98765432-12ab-cdef-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE customer_behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'Click' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET effectiveness_score = 8.5, strategy_name = 'Email Campaign' WHERE strategy_id = 201
UPDATE customer_behavior_data SET location = 'New York', behavior_type = 'Active' WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET target_audience = 'Young Adults', effectiveness_score = 8.5 WHERE strategy_id = 2001;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30, income = 50000 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE device_data SET usage_hours = 10, purchase_timestamp = '2021-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE device_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE device_data SET device_type = 'Smartphone', usage_hours = 5, purchase_timestamp = '2022-03-15 09:00:00' WHERE device_id = '987e6543-a21b-33c4-d567-232314135111';
UPDATE consumer_data SET event_type='click', location='Home' WHERE consumer_id=100
UPDATE consumer_data SET event_timestamp='2022-01-15 08:30:00', device_id=101 WHERE consumer_id=200
UPDATE consumer_data SET event_type = 'click', location = 'homepage' WHERE consumer_id = 123 AND device_id = 456
UPDATE consumer_data SET event_type = 'purchase', event_timestamp = '2021-10-15 12:30:00', location = 'checkout' WHERE consumer_id = 789
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', age = 25 WHERE customer_id = 1
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, stock_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 3
UPDATE customers SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1, stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 5 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
